Game.Name: Monster Farm Advance (Japan)
Game.plot:
Monster Rancher Advance is a Strategy game, developed and published by Tecmo,which was released in 2001.Cheat: Golden MonstersSeveral Golden monsters can be unlocked. Their stats are average, but they look cool.Cheat: Golden MonstersAll passwords are CaSe SeNsItIvE.Cheat: Golden MonstersDuring a game, enter the Shrine, and enter any of the following names to inlock the corresponding monster. Passwords are case sensitive.Cheat: Golden MonstersWhen making a monster at the shrine for the first time, use the tablet and type in:'Hobo' Cheat: Golden Monstersit's case sensitive so do it like that, anyway, you'll get a knight, it's a green color and it's no. 326 and it's name is Lezaal no idea about anything else but that it's restricted.Cheat: Special MonstersThere are some monsters that are classified as ''Special'' and they have stats that dwarf the normal monsters, some of the ''Special'' monsters can be obtained by entering these words. *Note these are case sensitive* Pabs Luminous Paladin - (durahan) Ninja LIKETEA - (naga) Santa - (momo) Cabbit - (psiroller) KEEPSLY -(zuum)

There are many more, try and find them on your own!
